div.p:
These tutorials cover the basics of creating messaging applications using RabbitMQ.
You need to have the RabbitMQ server installed to go through the tutorials ‒ please see the installation guide.
A final note before we start: the tutorials here are in Python or Java, but there are very good tutorials elsewhere using other programming languages.
If you're having trouble going through this tutorial you can post a message to the rabbitmq-discuss mailing list or join the #rabbitmq irc channel.
